text: “nætahot itamat visala yayi oba manasehi sitena venat onæma vastuvak bavata pat vanu”. (mese venas vu) pasu “apava kavurun nam pana ganvanneda?”yi ovunge vimasumata, (ese vimasuvahot nabiye! oba ovunta) “obava palamuven kavurun utpadanaya kaleda, ohuma (oba maranayata pat vu pasuda obava nægittavanu æta)” yayi pavasanu. eyata ovun tamange hisa oba pættata æla kara, “edina kavada (enneda)?”yi vimasannaha. (eyata) oba (ovunta “eya) itamat ikmaninda pæminiya hækiya” yayi pavasanu mænava
